featured.text: But nowadays, autographs (signatures) are big business.
After delivering a very powerful speech, the award winner was _____ by a group of fans asking for her signature.
Many athletes and VIPs demand payment for their signatures, and many people are willing to pay.
In the past, the signatures of athletes and VIPs __________.
According to this passage, many people now collect athletes’ and VIPs’ signatures __________.

definition.en_def: A person's name written in a distinctive way as a form of identification or authorization.
definition.example: Please sign your signature at the bottom of the document.
